title: The witch of Edmonton a known true story / composed into a tragi-comedy by divers well-esteemed poets, William Rowley, Thomas Dekker, John Ford, &c.
author: Rowley, William, 1585?-1642?
publisher: Printed by J. Cottrel for Edward Blackmore ...,
notes: "Acted by the Princes servants, often at the Cock-Pit in Drury-Lane, once at court with singular applause"
